column4: Psamathos Psamathides by [[Alan Lee]]]]'''Psamathos Psamathides''' was a wizard in ''[[Roverandom]]''. Psamathos is the oldest of the ''Psamathists'' - sand-sorcerers - is exceedingly old and wise, and enjoys spending his days sleeping in the sand.<ref name="Roverandom">{{HM

column1: In the story, Psamathos helps [[Rover]] by turning him back into a real dog (albeit of smaller size).<ref name="Roverandom"/>{{rp
column2: 12}} As Rover doesn't wish to go home, Psamathos has his postman [[Mew]] (a seagull) take Rover to the moon. When Rover (now "Roverandom") returned from the [[moon]], Psamathos tried to return Roverandom to his normal size but his magic could not undo [[Artaxerxes]]'s spell.<ref name="Roverandom"/>{{rp
column3: 17}} Psamathos summons the giant whale [[Uin]] to take Roverandom to the bottom of the Deep Blue Sea to persuade Artaxerxes to return him to the normal size.<ref name="Roverandom"/>{{rp
column4: 55-8}} At the end of the story, Roverandom is reunited with Psamathos and they become good friends.<ref name="Roverandom"/>{{rp
